title: iWatchFace
summary: BL3CK FACE: Analog watch face with a little "i" for android Wear
description: Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog dial)★ Date, month ★ Absolute bl3k background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog dial)
★ Date, month
★ Absolute bl3k background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view
More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Nice, but.. Date is too small to read.
